content: I'll definitely try out some of these methods, especially the French press and pour-over. I've heard great things about them. By the way, I've been trying to establish a consistent morning routine, which includes a 30-minute meditation session, followed by a 20-minute workout, and then a shower before getting ready for work. I've found that I'm most productive during the morning hours, usually between 9:00 am and 12:00 pm, when I can focus on my tasks without too many distractions. Do you have any suggestions on how I can make the most of this productive period?
